text: 46|29|jinnukalil oru sanghatte nam ninre atuttekk khur'an srad'dhiccukelkkuvanayi tiriccuvitta sandarbham (srad'dheyamanâ€Œ.) annane avar atin sannihitarayappeal avar an'yean'yam parannu: ninnal nissabdarayirikku. annane at kalinnappeal avar tannalute samudayattilekk takkitukarayikkeant tiriccupeayi
